title: Hour 1: QB Or Not QB
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Jeff Saturday, and Bart Scott discuss the levels of concern they have for Tom Brady and the Bucs this season. Plus, the debate is on and our guys can't agree on who will reach the Super Bowl first: the Bills or the Rams? As we look ahead to NFL Week 1, what does Bill Belichick have to do to erase those preseason doubts? Stephen A. and Saturday go head to head in the debate of who the Steelers will have under center on Sunday's season opener.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 1: Who will be the Week 1 starter for the Steelers?
